Privacy Policy

Last updated: March 2024

Introduction

Welcome to the Aspect Ratio Calculator. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our website.

Information We Collect

We collect minimal information to provide and improve our service:

  • Basic usage statistics
  • Device and browser information
  • Cookies for functionality

How We Use Your Information

We use the collected information to:

  • Provide and maintain our service
  • Improve user experience
  • Analyze usage patterns

Advertising

We use Google AdSense to display advertisements on our website. Google AdSense may use cookies and web beacons to:

  • Serve personalized ads based on your browsing history
  • Prevent showing you the same ad multiple times
  • Measure the effectiveness of advertisements

You can opt out of personalized advertising by visiting Google Ads Settings.

Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us.
